name: 2D Probending
description:
For learning Game maker I made this 2D same PC multiplayer Pro-bending game. It was made a while back.  And it was not finished because it was meant for figuring out how game maker works. And after that, I had to work on other projects. 

Controls : 

(They could have been better was first planning on making it LAN multiplayer. That would allow aiming with a mouse. But didn't have enough time for that.)

Left player: w-a-s-d (to move) r-f (to aim up and down) t ( fire move) g (earth disc) 

Right player: Arrow keys (to move) Numpad 1 - 4 (to aim up and down) Numpad 8 ( fire move) Numpad 2 (earth disc)
